articles.description: Bayern Munich are in advanced talks with Burnley for the shock appointment of Vincent Kompany as their new coach.
articles.title: Vincent Kompany: Bayern Munich in advanced talks with Burnley over move for manager

articles.description: Ademola Lookman etched himself into Atalanta folklore with a Europa League final hat-trick that he says didn’t catch him by surprise – although boss Gian Piero Gasperini admitted nobody could have expected his progress.
articles.title: Ademola Lookman: Atalanta's hat-trick hero targets more glory after Europa League history

articles.description: Star players have come and gone, but through Manchester United and Manchester City's Premier League rivalry, two local brothers have documented the characters and the chaos.
articles.title: FA Cup final: Manchester City v Manchester United - a rivalry

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen boss Xabi Alonso praises his side's "exceptional" record-breaking unbeaten run but says it hurts that it was ended in the Europa League final.
articles.title: Atalanta 3-0 Bayer Leverkusen: Xabi Alonso on 'painful' loss as unbeaten run ends

articles.description: England's first T20 against Pakistan at Headingley is abandoned without a ball being bowled because of rain.
articles.title: England v Pakistan: First T20 at Headingley abandoned because of rain

articles.description: British Olympic swimming champion David Wilkie dies at the age of 70.
articles.title: David Wilkie: Olympic champion swimmer dies aged 70

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu is set to play at the Nottingham Open in June before Wimbledon starts on 1 July.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu set to play Nottingham Open in June

articles.description: Follow live text of Atalanta v Bayer Leverkusen in the Europa League Final.
articles.title: Europa League final: Atalanta vs Bayer Leverkusen - score and live text

articles.description: England manager talks to BBC sport editor Dan Roan about his provisional 33-man squad for Euro 2024.
articles.title: England Euro 2024 squad: Gareth Southgate explains

articles.description: Ipswich are fighting to convince Kieran McKenna to stay, Manchester City are open to offers for Bernardo Silva, Mauricio Pochettino is on England's radar, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Ipswich fight to keep Kieran McKenna
